title: Bagels On Greene
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Western, Buffet, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The veg menu offers multiple sandwiches and salads. Has an Indian food buffet and masala dosa, and a Mexican bar with quesadillas, tacos and burritos. Vegetarian specialty bagels include jalape√±o, and coconut. Smothie bar uses fresh frutis and vegetables, with no sugar added. Coffee bar uses Indian monsoon coffee. Has Wi-Fi.
